title: Bai Bian Xiao Ba Zhi Chao Xue Xianfeng
synopsis: On a technologically advanced island, while technology brings convenience to residents there, it also brings some unexpected environmental crises. At this time, Goethe, an artificial intelligence school, and a super-learning pioneer composed of six children, will send out to help everyone. The school bus Goethe can be turned into an engineering vehicle with different functions, and the six children are good at different subjects. They cleverly use the knowledge of science, technology, engineering, art, mathematics and sports to help everyone solve all problems. (translated from iqiyi)
